name: Mahjong Extreme - Plus
description:
Mahjong Extreme is a tile-based game that originated in China during the Qing dynasty.

Mahjong Extreme is the Deluxe edition of this ancient chinese game.

Collect trophies with 344 challenges to complete and see your ranking.

Enjoy 43 different boards and 44 leaderboards.

> Alien
> Anchor
> Arena
> Bat
> Bird
> Boat
> Bunny
> Butterfly
> Castle

> Temple
> Tower
> Tree
> Turtle
> Yinyang


To win, match all the identical tiles, 2 by 2.

Each game has 144 tiles, made of 4 sets of 36 different tiles.

More boards will be added in the next releases.

This game has no Ads.

NB: we have many other games in the App Store.
